oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Design of output feedback compensator for discrete time system via reduced order model
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: UMAPATHY, M
BANDYOPADHYAY, B
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: reduction
order reduction
smart structure
vibration control
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A method to design an output feedback compensator for a higher order discrete time system with distinct complex eigenvalues via its reduced order model is presented. Its application is shown for vibration control of a smart cantilever beam. As the states are not needed for feedback, the method is simple and can be easily implemented.
